short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dim facebook links to untrustworthy news sites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bad News dims links shared on Facebook from notoriously misleading, clickbait-y, or half-satirical websites. Its goal is to hide the posts that contribute to post-truth politics.
